name: farmhouse dish cloth
notes:
skill level: easy

materials:

cotton yarn/4: desired colors. (i use lion brand 24/7 cotton in the example photos)
u.s. size g/4.0mm crochet hook
yarn needle
scissors
 

stitches & abbreviations:

ch  = chain

hdc = half-double crochet

hdc sl st = half double crochet slip stitch

sc= single crochet

sl st = slip stitch

st(s) = stitches 

*please remember you are free to use this pattern to make/sell item(s), giving credit back to the designer; do not republish or distribute this pattern or use my photos in any way. feel free to share my shop links! thank you!
